params._contractAddress: address of the contract to have policies applied

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.details: Builds a foreign call structure and adds it to the contracts storage, mapped to the contract address it is associated with

params._foreignCall: The definition of the foreign call to create*
params._policyId: the policy Id of the policy the foreign call will be mapped to

createPolicy(bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[.details: The parameters had to be complex because nested structs are not allowed for externally facing functions

params._functionSignatureIds: corresponding signature ids in the policy. The elements in this array are one to one matches of the elements in _signatures array. They store the functionSignatureId for each of the signatures in _signatures array.
params._ruleIds: two dimensional array of the rules. This array contains a simple count at first level and the second level is the array of ruleId's within the policy.

params._policyId: the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with

returns._0: trackerIndex the index of the tracker

deleteForeignCall(uint256,uint256).details: Deletes a foreign call from storage

params._policyId: the policyId the foreign call is associated with
the id of the policy to delete

params._ruleId: the id of the rule to delete

params._policyId: the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with
params._trackerIndex: the index of the tracker to delete

getAllForeignCalls(uint256).details: Retrieve Foreign Call Set from storage

params._policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve
the policyId the trackers are associated with

returns._0: trackers the trackers in the policy

params._foreignCallId: the Id of the foreign call to retrieve
params._policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve

returns.functionSigIds: function signature ids corresponding to each function sig in functionSigs(from Policy.functionSignatureIdMap)
returns.functionSigs: function signatures within the policy(from Policy.functionSignatureIdMap)
returns.ruleIds: rule ids corresponding to each function signature in functionSigs(from Policy.signatureToRuleIds)

params._index: postion of the tracker to return
params._policyId: the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with

updateForeignCall(uint256,uint256,(bool,.details: Updates a foreign call in storage

params._policyId: the policyId the foreign call is associated with

params._functionSignature: the string representation of the function signature
params._pTypes: the types of the parameters for the function in order

updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],.details: The parameters had to be complex because nested structs are not allowed for externally facing functions

params._functionSignatureIds: corresponding signature ids in the policy. The elements in this array are one to one matches of the elements in _signatures array. They store the functionSignatureId for each of the signatures in _signatures array.
params._ruleIds: two dimensional array of the rules. This array contains a simple count at first level and the second level is the array of ruleId's within the policy.

params._policyId: the policyId the trackerStorage is associated with
params._trackerIndex: the index of the tracker to update

applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Apply the policies to the contracts.

createPolicy(bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[.notice: Add a Policy to Storage and create the policy admin for the policy

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bytes).notice: Add a tracker to the trackerStorage mapping.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Delete a tracker from the trackerStorage.

getAppliedPolicyIds(address).notice: Get an applied policyId from storage.

getFunctionSignature(uint256).notice: Get a function signature from storage.

getPolicy(uint256).notice: Get a policy from storage. Since Policy contains nested mappings, they must be broken into arrays to return the data externally.

getTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Return a tracker from the trackerStorage.

updateFunctionSignature(uint256,bytes4,u.notice: Add a function signature to the storage.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.notice: Function to update tracker in trackerStorage mapping.
